Description: Fine Watches & Cufflinks WatchesAndBeyond 1-866-593-8525 / 1-845-573-9833 | About us | Shipping | Payments | Return Policy | Hours of Operation | Contact Us | Accutron by Bulova Stratford Chronograph Stainless Steel Mens Watch 63B141 Accutron by Bulova Stratford Chronograph Stainless Steel Mens Swiss Watch Model# 63B141. The watch case & bracelet are crafted from brushed & polished stainless steel, Tachymeter Scale on inner bezel, Black textured dial set with silver tone & luminous hand indicators, silver tone index hour markers, Date display at the 4 o'clock position, Chronograph Functions; 1/10 second register, 30 Minute Register, Central second register, small seconds, Scratch Resistant Sapphire Crystal, Screw-down Case back, Swiss Quartz Chronograph Movement, Water Resistant to 50 meters/165 feet. Two Year Limited Warranty. As all of our watches, this Bulova Stratford Gents watch is BRAND NEW, and comes in its original packaging with the warranty card and papers! Brand: Accutron by Bulova Style: Stratford Model: 63B141 Case: Brushed & Polished Stainless Steel Strap: Brushed & Polished Stainless Steel Clasp: Push Button Deployment Dial: Black Textured Diameter of case: 42 mm Crystal: Scratch Resistant Sapphire Water Resistant: 50 meters/165 feet Movement: Swiss Quartz Chronograph Please note: As all of our watches, this Accutron by Bulova Stratford Mens watch is brand new and in mint condition. It comes in its original packaging, warranty card and papers. Please click on one of the following links to view the most unique Watches & Cufflinks you will find on the Internet!!! Our staff of skilled professionals strive to provide each customer with unsurpassed service. Our sincere commitment to customer service, superb selection and value, has been making a pleasant experience to our customers and has been bringing them back time after time since 1999. As Wholesalers, we have the opportunity to provide you with brand name watches at prices far lower than any Authorized Dealer can give you. While our watches are guaranteed to be 100% authentic, since we are not Authorized Distributors for many of the brands we sell, we are free to sell at a price that is mutually beneficial for us and our customers alike. "Authorized" dealers are required to sell watches within the manufacturers' pricing guidelines. We purchase our watches from Authorized Dealers as well as other legitimated channels of distribution in the watch industry. Having access to a wide variety of distributors & watches we have the opportunity to purchase at the lowest possible cost and pass the savings to our customers. Shipping Rates & Policies: Most of our items are shipped within 1-2 business days of confirmed payment receipt. All items are shipped fully insured for the amount paid. Domestic Orders: UPS Ground - Free UPS 2nd Day Air - $15.00 UPS Next Day Air - $25.00 International Orders: FedEx to Canada - $58.00 FedEx to Europe - $72.00 FedEx to all other locations - $80.00 All International Bidders: PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING BEFORE BIDDING! We are not be responsible for any additional costs, such as customs, import duties, VAT, or any other taxes incurred by your local Government. Customs policies vary from country to country, we urge you to contact your local Customs Agency with any questions. All International Sales are Final!!! Payments: We accept the following payment methods: Paypal We Accept Payments through PayPal - Its FAST, FREE And SECURE! Return Policy: Watches And Beyond will gladly exchange or refund any unworn and undamaged item with all original packaging materials. All returns must receive a Return Merchandise Authorization (RMA) number by calling 1-866-593-8525, and be returned to WatchesAndBeyond within 15 days of receipt of the original purchase. The RMA number must be clearly written on the outside of the package. Any item returned without an RMA # is subject to a 15% restocking fee. If, at any time during that period, you are not completely satisfied, return your purchase for a full refund excluding the original shipping expenses, or exchange! NO QUESTIONS ASKED! The items being returned must be shipped back with insurance at the full value of the item being returned, at the customer’s expense. Ship to: Watches & Beyond 62 W 47th St # 509 New York, NY 10036 All merchandise will be inspected and must be free from damage, alterations and wear. Bid with Confidence: We have been in the watch business for over 15 years and selling on eBay since 1999 where we have earned a 100% positive feedback rating.
